extendedIngredients.name: acorn squash
extendedIngredients.originalString: 3 large acorn squash, cut in half

extendedIngredients.name: stuffing mix
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 pkg. (6 oz.) STOVE TOP Stuffing Mix for Chicken

recipes.title: Stuffed Acorn Squash
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 350F.  Place squash, cut sides down, on foil-lined 15x10x1-inch baking pan; cover. Bake 30 minutes.                                             Meanwhile, remove casing from sausage.  Crumble sausage into small skillet.  Cook until no longer pink; drain.                                            Prepare Stuffing as directed on package, except decrease butter to 3 Tbsp. Add sausage, apple and raisins; mix lightly.                                            Turn squash over.  Spoon 3/4 cup of the stuffing mixture into each squash half; cover with foil. Bake an additional 30 minutes or until squash is tender, removing foil for last 10 minutes of baking time.

steps.step: Place squash, cut sides down, on foil-lined 15x10x1-inch baking pan; cover.
Meanwhile, remove casing from sausage.  Crumble sausage into small skillet.  Cook until no longer pink; drain.
Prepare Stuffing as directed on package, except decrease butter to 3 Tbsp.
Add sausage, apple and raisins; mix lightly.
Turn squash over.  Spoon 3/4 cup of the stuffing mixture into each squash half; cover with foil.
Bake an additional 30 minutes or until squash is tender, removing foil for last 10 minutes of baking time.
